scripts.pool-sync: node -e "const PoolSync = require('./services/event-driven-pool-sync'); const service = new PoolSync(); service.start().catch(console.error);"
scripts.pool-sync:manual: node -e "const PoolSync = require('./services/event-driven-pool-sync'); const service = new PoolSync(); service.initialize().then(() => service.syncAllPools()).catch(console.error);"
scripts.pool-sync:event-driven:test: node -e "const EventSync = require('./services/event-driven-pool-sync'); const service = new EventSync(); service.start().then(() => console.log('Event-driven sync started')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.slip-sync:event-driven:test: node -e "const EventSlipSync = require('./services/event-driven-slip-sync'); const service = new EventSlipSync(); service.start().then(() => console.log('Event-driven slip sync started')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.bet-sync:event-driven:test: node -e "const EventBetSync = require('./services/event-driven-bet-sync'); const service = new EventBetSync(); service.start().then(() => console.log('Event-driven bet sync started')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.analytics:update: node -e "const Analytics = require('./services/enhanced-analytics-service'); const service = new Analytics(); service.populateOddysseyAnalytics().catch(console.error);"
scripts.daily-stats:manual: node -e "const DailyStats = require('./services/daily-stats-service'); const service = new DailyStats(); service.calculateAllDailyStats().catch(console.error);"
scripts.all-services: concurrently "npm run start" "npm run indexer" "npm run indexer:reputation" "npm run oracle-cron" "npm run evaluator" "npm run fixtures-scheduler" "npm run crypto:scheduler" "npm run oracle:services" "npm run pool-sync:event-driven" "npm run slip-sync:event-driven" "npm run bet-sync:event-driven"
scripts.indexer:test: node -e "const RpcManager = require('./utils/rpc-manager'); const rm = new RpcManager(); rm.getBlockNumber().then(b => console.log('Block:', b)).catch(console.error);"
scripts.indexer:status: node -e "const RpcManager = require('./utils/rpc-manager'); const rm = new RpcManager(); rm.logStatus();"
